Project Modules

This project has declared the following modules:

NameDescription
Robospice - Persistence Module ParentRoboSpice persistence module parent
Robospice - Core Module ParentRoboSpice core module parent
Robospice - Extension Spring Android Module ParentRoboSpice Spring Android module parent
Robospice - Extension Google Http Java Client Module ParentRoboSpice Extension Google Http Java Client module parent
Robospice - Extension ORMLite Module ParentRoboSpice ORMLite module parent
Robospice - Extension UI SpiceList ParentRoboSpice UI SpiceList module parent
Robospice - Sample CoreA simple sample that demonstrates how to use the core module of RoboSpice.
Robospice - Sample Core - offline-
Robospice - Sample Spring AndroidA simple sample that demonstrates how to use the Spring Android module of RoboSpice.
Robospice - Sample Google Http Java ClientA simple sample that demonstrates how to use the Google Http Java Client module of RoboSpice.
Robospice - Sample ORMLite + SpringAndroidA simple sample that demonstrates how to use the ORMLite module of RoboSpice. As it is only a caching extension, we will combine it with SpringAndroid for REST requests.
Robospice - Sample SpiceList + SpringAndroidA simple sample that demonstrates how to use the UI SpiceList module of RoboSpice. As it is only a UI extension, we will combine it with SpringAndroid for REST requests.
